1603750.name: Out of the Woods
1603750.description:
Welcome to the Green Home National Park — a magnificent natural area where incredible beauty and an exciting variety of natural wonders meet. In this unique nature reserve, nature thrives in all its glory, offering visitors unforgettable experiences and amazing adventures.

The National Park is famous for its endless forests, green valleys and majestic mountains. You can also find bizarre rocks and canyons, stunning waterfalls and deep lakes. You can explore the hidden trails leading to the hidden corners of the park, and watch the grandiose views that will open your eyes.

UPDATED: AFTER A RECENT INCIDENT, LOCAL AUTHORITIES DECIDED TO CLOSE THE NATIONAL PARK




The game has 4 survival mode, each with its own complexity and specific. The main goal remains unchanged - to get out of the wood.

Survival
Classic mode. It is necessary to monitor thirst, hunger and fatigue. Use your supplies properly, and if you don't plan on dying, look for new ones.

Investigation
Survival, complemented by opportunities to explore some points of interest. The diary will have additional goals - missing persons cases in this area, as well as a unique opportunity to find the reasons why the national park decided to close.

Tourist
A special mode for those who prefer to explore the map, look for interesting places, Easter eggs and the rest stuff. All vital signs will be turned off, so you won't have to worry about hunger, thirst and fatigue. The diary will also include interesting notes about the development of the game.

Endless Forest
The most difficult mode. To the standard Survival mode, a maniac is added who has chosen you as his next victim. In addition to the deadly traps of different types placed inside the park, some paths from the classic mode will be unavailable. The park can become your home forever.
1603750.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
